body_html:
I'm able to execute python convolutional.py --self_test with no issue but below command throwing error. How I can solve it? Can someone provide detailed resolution? ( Sorry I'm new to Python ) .

[root@localhost ~]# virtualenv --system-site-packages -p python3 ~/tensorflow
Running virtualenv with interpreter /usr/bin/python3
Using base prefix '/usr'
New python executable in /root/tensorflow/bin/python3
Not overwriting existing python script /root/tensorflow/bin/python (you must use /root/tensorflow/bin/python3)
Installing setuptools, pip, wheel...done.
[root@localhost ~]#

[root@localhost ~]# source ~/tensorflow/bin/activate

(tensorflow) [root@localhost ~]# export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/root/cuda/lib64

(tensorflow) [root@localhost ~]# python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional
/root/tensorflow/bin/python: Error while finding spec for 'tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional' (<class 'ImportError'>: No module named 'tensorflow.models')

body:
I'm able to execute python convolutional.py --self_test with no issue but below command throwing error. How I can solve it? Can someone provide detailed resolution? ( Sorry I'm new to Python ) .

[root@localhost ~]# virtualenv --system-site-packages -p python3 ~/tensorflow
Running virtualenv with interpreter /usr/bin/python3
Using base prefix '/usr'
New python executable in /root/tensorflow/bin/python3
Not overwriting existing python script /root/tensorflow/bin/python (you must use /root/tensorflow/bin/python3)
Installing setuptools, pip, wheel...done.
[root@localhost ~]#

[root@localhost ~]# source ~/tensorflow/bin/activate

(tensorflow) [root@localhost ~]# export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/root/cuda/lib64

(tensorflow) [root@localhost ~]# python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional
/root/tensorflow/bin/python: Error while finding spec for 'tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional' (<class 'ImportError'>: No module named 'tensorflow.models')
